properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT access token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: JWT secret key (for symmetric encryption, not used with RSA).

properties.name: management.endpoint.health.show-details
properties.description: When to show full health details (never, when-authorized, always).
